body: I think a page level `curl` should not be taken care of by the community. This should be an easy locating work.
Sorry, your question is out of the project's scope.
Please search the issue first.

> This description is not enough, I am not sure what `when i use arthas look classloader info, org.springframework.boot.loader.LaunchedURLClassLoader just load one class` means.

org.springframework.boot.loader.LaunchedURLClassLoader should load class in springboot project, when add skywalking, it looks like something stuck the load
I think you have to set up new sub-projects to do so. Anything to propose?
Spring boot codes are used in many test cases. I don't know this is the typical key.
Such as this one, https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/test/plugin/scenarios/spring-tx-scenario/pom.xml#L40

I found a new bug when i coding the scenarios test for the spring MVC plugin. i have fixed in last commit
 `org.apache.skywalking.apm.plugin.spring.mvc.commons.interceptor.RequestMappingMethodInterceptor#getRequestURL`

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20854418/115739073-3305d280-a3c0-11eb-92cd-3777b44a6ceb.png)

1. the annotation RequestMapping with the value[value()] array length equals zero represents an empty string in the spring MVC concept.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20854418/115740608-917f8080-a3c1-11eb-845a-7668e0d39993.png)



2. RequestMapping in spring mvc 3.x and 4.1  has no the path method [path()], if RequestMapping with  with the value[value()] array length equals zore in spring mvc 3 will cause no such method error;
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20854418/115740421-6006b500-a3c1-11eb-95c1-19a6b86a6f93.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20854418/115743703-7bbf8a80-a3c4-11eb-9260-e14064dba9eb.png)



3. because of AliasFor annotation, no need to call path(), I have tested
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20854418/115740763-bbd13e00-a3c1-11eb-8830-22deb853d5e6.png)
do not merge before I finish the scenario test for spring MVC.

> do not merge before I finish the scenario test for spring MVC.

 I expect you could update the plugin test scenarios.
@YunfengGao Ping me after you resolve all comments and tests passed locally
@darcydai We are facing unexpect MySQL plugin test fails, I have pinged @kezhenxu94 @ascrutae to see what is going on.
@dbaicss Yes. I'm working on Istio and SkyWalking integration right now.

It's useless for checked the`DISABLE CACHE` option in my chrome browser's develop tool.
All response data is new, why browser cache can cause this problem? Is there a refresh mechanism?

It's so inconvenient, I don't want to clear cache other than skywalking.

> Do you have next PR coming?

 PR over and Test passed

> It's useless for checked the`DISABLE CACHE` option in my chrome browser's develop tool.
> All response data is new, why browser cache can cause this problem? Is there a refresh mechanism?
> 
> It's so inconvenient, I don't want to clear cache other than skywalking.

We don't explain the history and codes, if you want to understand or enhance the features, you need to follow the context by yourself. We are just saying it is what it is right now.

And I am hard to understand what do you mean again. What do you have done on your side, is a black box to us. 
Please understand how an open source community works, it is about collaboration, we are not responding like a commercial service vendor.

I didn't do anything.  The UI dashboard may becomes blank again after a few days. 

I found another way to clear browser cache for skywalking only (MaxOS):
press `Option` + `Command` + `I`
then press `Command` + `Shift` + `P`
then type `Clear site data`
press `Enter`

I just don't want to clear all browser cache.
The above method is useful for me.
Thanks for your reply ^_^
You need to refresh, the UI is querying the last time range. That is all.

Hi, I finally found that why one specific metrics data will only do persistent in one specific L2 oap node. Because when RemoteSenderService#send called, L1 oap will hash the metrics data(exp: EndpointCpm hashed by timeBucket and entityId), the hash result is unique, so every time L1 choose the same L2 oap node.

And because one metrics data is only persistent in one L2 oap node, so there will no racing condition problem.
